00389 inline IInteractiveShape* CViewBase::GetMouseShapePtr() const
00390 {
00391        if (!m_isMouseShapeValid){
00392               CalcMouseShape();
00393               m_isMouseShapeValid = true;
00394        }
00395        return m_mouseShapePtr;
00396 }

00432 
00433 inline IViewLayer& CViewBase::GetLayer(int index) const
00434 {
00435        if (GetLayersCount() <= 0){
00436               CViewBase* view = const_cast<CViewBase*> (this);
00437               view->InsertDefaultLayers();
00438        }
00439 
00440        I_ASSERT((index >= 0) && (index < int(m_layers.size())));
00441 
00442        IViewLayer* layerPtr = m_layers[index];
00443        I_ASSERT(layerPtr != NULL);
00444 
00445        return *layerPtr;
00446 }

00463 inline i2d::CRect CViewBase::GetBoundingBox() const
00464 {
00465        if (!m_isBoundingBoxValid){
00466               m_boundingBox = CalcBoundingBox();
00467 
00468               m_isBoundingBoxValid = true;
00469        }
00470 
00471        return m_boundingBox;

00535 inline void CViewBase::SetBackgroundBufferValid(bool state)
00536 {
00537        if (state != m_isBackgroundBufferValid){
00538               if (!state){
00539                      m_invalidatedBox = GetClientRect();
00540               }
00541               m_isBackgroundBufferValid = state;
00542        }
00543 }
